thread.title: Iguana, who answers to no man, wreaks havoc at the Miami Open tennis tournament
thread.title_full: Iguana, who answers to no man, wreaks havoc at the Miami Open tennis tournament

author: Sam Speedy
title: Iguana, who answers to no man, wreaks havoc at the Miami Open tennis tournament
text:
For tennis fans, the sport is a thrill. For everyone else, it's a lot of grunting and running in a confined space. To each their own.
Throw a very excitable iguana in the mix, though, and literally everyone is on board. Tennis is the new national past time.
SEE ALSO: Once and for all, people: Stop bringing snakes on planes, because stuff like this happens
Tommy Haas and Jiri Vesely were in the middle of their match when this guy just, like, found his way on to the court.
i cannot stop watching this iguana scamper across a tennis court https://t.co/pwt9krAajS pic.twitter.com/xVTbJrQLRn
— whitney (@its_whitney) March 22, 2017
He started off chillin' on the scoreboard for a relaxed sec:
Iggy, Iggy, Iggy, can't you see?
Keep off the tennis court, please. pic.twitter.com/7WaG5kaUDV
— Miami Open (@MiamiOpen) March 22, 2017
Then ended up dangling upside down which is a skill I now know iguanas possess.
when you REALLY want to find out what the score is of the Tommy Haas match pic.twitter.com/uVax0KsTrg
— Ricky Dimon (@Dimonator) March 22, 2017
Posed for a selfie with the guy he was stealing the spotlight from (so gracious, this iguana).
Sorry, Iggy, but @tommyhaas13 iguana go finish the match. pic.twitter.com/teApNiQps2
— Miami Open (@MiamiOpen) March 22, 2017
Made some rough calls that ended up being not super smart but still, kudos for trying.
Iguana comes up short in the Long Jump at the @MiamiOpen Track and Field Championships pic.twitter.com/evWoTU5tz0
— Ricky Dimon (@Dimonator) March 22, 2017
Finally, he closed out the show with a scene-stealing walk that is really, quite delightful. You can watch the whole thing unfold here.
Iguana be like you!
An unusual on-court streaker interrupts play... #MiamiOpen pic.twitter.com/MgAZ1PruGs
— Tennis TV (@TennisTV) March 22, 2017
Monday Night Tennis, featuring your host, a lawless iguana. Make it happen!
WATCH: NBD, just a massive alligator out for a stroll
